channel.title: New RSC PK Server (:
channel.description:
--Start off with the old 9999 sharks and super sets! New PKing island, new armor, and a load of other custom things
Rather not list everything and let you try it out for yourself :) http://uppit.com/REMOVED

item.title: New RSC PK Server (:
item.dc:creator: @DSL DSL
item.description:
@DSL wrote:

Yea, I’m not even gonna try this server. You should sell the idea of the server better next time, tell us what’s good about it, or at least give some random info about the server, give us something. Do you even have a website?

Sorry, better luck next time!

Read full topic

item.title: New RSC PK Server (:
item.dc:creator: @SamanthaSoul SamanthaSoul
item.description:
@SamanthaSoul wrote:

[quote=“Lights Out, post:1, topic:442626”]–Start off with the old 9999 sharks and super sets!
New PKing island, new armor, and a load of other custom things

Rather not list everything and let you try it out for yourself
http://uppit.com/1g8ttjrfxxz1/RSC.zip[/quote]

Do you know what “advertisement” means?

You’re supposed to convince us to play your server. We’re not supposed to do the work for you.

Read full topic
